name: Fiendish Eyes
summary: You can see in the darkness as easily as a fiend.
description:
You can see in the darkness as easily as a fiend. You gain darkvision.

Special You can select this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of this feat.Traits

Tiefling: A creature with this trait has the tiefling versatile heritage. Tieflings are planar scions descended from fiends. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by tieflings.
